ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail! I m a human warrior (male) and what I ve found to be good is a spiked collor. it s add s AC+3 and STG+3. I have 95stg and with that i have 98. It s help
ygData.messageBody:
Hail! I'm a human warrior (male) and what I've found to be good is a spiked
collor. it's add's AC+3 and STG+3. I have 95stg and with that i have 98.
It's help alot! Also if you can get one SOW ring (adds lots to AGL) and one
bloodsained mantle you'll be set and run fast as a wolf. I've also found
that onyx earrings add +2 to AGL witch helps out alot! There about 1pp each
and Gnol Commanders tend to drop them.


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
Date: Mon, 24 May 1999 10:33:03 +0900

From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

BAH! 130! try being a warrior with 75 str!

Flesh band rings increase str by 2 and bloodstained mantle increase it by 4.
Only thing I know off.

How to make money, hmm patience. Im level 21 now and the mobs I fight
generally drop either platinum as loot or expensive items I can sell.

By level 12 I had made about 80pp from trading and then another 100 by level
16 when I bought my banded. I made the money from player trading (selling
mino axes and dervish rings in qeynos and halas etc etc). I found this to
be tedious and no longer need to do that.

> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:30 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor
>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank. Although I have a fine steel long
> sword, I can't seem to get enough loot to buy any decent armor. I am in
> east commons now headed back to Halas and I only have 10 plat in the
bank.
>
> Help! Where should I be hunting to get loot!
>
> p.s. On top of that, I know once I get decent armor it will weigh me
down.
>
> What is avalible at higher ranks to increase my strength (currently a
> paltry
> 130)?
>
